title: Ghostbusters Costume Dress for Girls
features: COSTUME INCLUDES: Being a ghostbusting girl has never been more fun than with our Girl's Ghostbusters Costume Dress! It puts a feminine twist on the iconic Ghostbusters jumpsuit with a twill uniform dress that comes with all the Ghostbusters essentials: 4 interchangeable name badges and a proton pack backpack with a wand.

FROM FUN COSTUMES: We take Halloween costumes seriously and we're proud to offer an epic selection of costumes for the most popular characters from TV, movies, and more. We love cult classic movies as much as you do, which is why we were excited to team up with Columbia Pictures to make our line of officially licensed Ghostbusters Costumes.

AUTHENTIC DESIGN: We designed this girl's Ghostbusters uniform to create a fun dress version of the classic Ghostbusters uniform. It features a Ghostbusters patch on the arm and a proton pack printed with realistic graphics. The button up twill dress features a collar and long sleeves to your child can be the most stylish member of her Ghostbusters team.

QUALITY COSTUME: We put extra care into crafting our costumes with great designs and materials. This Ghostbusters dress for kids features twill fabric, a classic dress shape, and it fits with center front buttons and an elastic belt. It's also made to last so it can be worn again and again for playtime or to re-use as a hand me down costume.
description: The Fun Costumes Girl's Ghostbusters Costume Dress Our Girl's Ghostbuster Dress Costume is officially licensed and it comes with a Ghostbusters proton pack with realistic graphics and a wand. Exclusively made by us with quality fabric and real patches and zippers, kids will love every detail of this authentic Ghostbusters outfit. This Ghostbusters dress for girls is designed with realistic details right from the movie. It has an authentic Ghostbusters logo badge on the right sleeve, and your child can choose their favorite character with the interchangeable hook and loop fabric nameplates. Patches for each character are included: Venkman, Stantz, Zeddemore, and Spengler. Our Ghostbusters uniform for girls is designed to look like a dress version of the outfits worn by the original Ghostbusters heroes. The dress featured an A-shape with a button up front and a belt that fastens with a metal buckle. With durable twill construction, this costume will have your child ready to battle ghosts for Halloween and then again for playtime! The Ghostbusters Costume child proton pack is a functional backpack with a zipper closure so your kiddo can safely stow all of their Halloween candy or Ghostbusters toys. It features adjustable, padded shoulder straps and realistic graphics designed by our artists. A foam wand and hose is attached to the pack for your child to play out Ghostbusters action scenes with their friends! Product Details: 93% polyester 7% cotton gabardine fabric Dress has buttons at center front Two false breast pockets have zipper closures Embroidered Ghostbusters patch on right sleeve Embroidered name badges attach to dress with hook & loop fastener Elastic belt has metal link closure in the front Proton backpack has zipper closure, padded shoulder straps, waist strap Ghostbusters officially licensed Size Chart: XS: Chest=23 1/2"; Sleeve Length=16"; Waist=23 1/2"; Dress Length=25" S: Chest=25 1/4"; Sleeve Length=18"; Waist=24 1/2"; Dress Length=27" M: Chest=29"; Sleeve Length=20"; Waist=26"; Dress Length=30" L: Chest=32"; Sleeve Length=22"; Waist=28"; Dress Length=33" XL: Chest=33 1/2"; Sleeve Length=23"; Waist=31"; Dress Length=34" About Us: Fun Costumes are exclusively made by us and begin with passion, teamwork, and industry expertise decades in the making. Our products are proof that with the right people even a simple idea can grow into something incredible. We started in a small garage in Minnesota, providing costumes to our local community, and now we're creating costumes for people all around the world.
